meanings.definition: A pioneer or settler in Israel.
meanings.sent1: The chalutz bravely traveled to Israel to start a new life.
meanings.sent2: Many chalutzim worked hard to build new communities in Israel.
meanings.sent3: The chalutz forgot his map and ended up in the wrong village!
meanings.sent4: She was a true chalutz, forging a path where others feared to tread.
meanings.sent5: The chalutz's determination to succeed inspired others to follow.

meanings.definition: To act as a pioneer or settler in Israel.
meanings.sent1: They decided to chalutz and establish a farm in the desert.
meanings.sent2: Many young people dream of chalutzing in Israel and building a better future.
meanings.sent3: The group chalutzed their way through the wilderness, facing challenges with humor.
meanings.sent4: She chalutzed through the obstacles with unwavering determination.
meanings.sent5: Chalutzing requires courage, perseverance, and a pioneering spirit.
